attributes.review: so i got this app because my dog died and i wanted a new pet orange. apparently you can’t buy the president. the app also made my phone crash constantly and it made my phone grow legs and chase me through the halls of my own home. trump has also raped people and he’s a child predator and a sexist cheeto puff🥳🥳🥳
